PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.

subsystemDomain.description: A subsystem is your apps bundle ID or is explicitly set through the os_log_create function. Wildcards are not accepted

DEFAULT-OPTIONS.description: Default logging settings for logs that have no category set.

Default-Privacy-Setting.description: Changes how variables eg string substitutions are formatted in the log

Propagate-with-Activity.description: Messages are attached to the activity tree in Console and crash dumps

TTL.description: Changes how long a log entry will remain before being removed

Default.description: Default Log Level TTL in days

Debug.description: Debug Log Level TTL in days

Info.description: Info Log Level TTL in days

Level.description: Configures minimum logging level and persistence level

Enable.description: The minimum log level that will be enabled. Messages sent through NSLog are at the Default level. The default value of this is inherited from the System setting.

Persist.description: The minimum log level that will be persisted. Messages sent through NSLog are at the Default level. The default value of this is inherited from the System setting.
